characters.name: Bastian
characters.description: A fellow inmate who has been at El Palo de Queso for several years. He knows the ins and outs of the prison and can be a valuable ally if you maintain his trust.
characters.background: Bastian has survived in the prison by staying neutral and helping those who help him. He has connections throughout the facility.

unlocks.50: Bastian shares prison secrets and safe routes
unlocks.70: Bastian introduces you to his network of contacts
unlocks.90: Bastian commits to helping you escape

characters.name: Marcel
characters.description: A quiet inmate who keeps to himself. You haven't had much interaction with him yet, so your relationship is neutral.
characters.background: Marcel arrived around the same time as you. Nobody knows much about him, and he prefers it that way.

unlocks.60: Marcel reveals he's actually an undercover agent
unlocks.85: Marcel offers to help with your escape plan

characters.name: Viktor
characters.description: A member of the dominant prison gang. He views you with suspicion and has made it clear you're not welcome in his territory.
characters.background: Viktor runs protection rackets in his cell block and doesn't like outsiders. You got off on the wrong foot with him during your first day.

unlocks.40: Viktor offers protection in exchange for favors
unlocks.70: Viktor pledges his gang's support for your escape

characters.name: Denis
characters.description: A friendly inmate who works in the kitchen. He helped you out when you first arrived and seems genuinely kind despite the harsh environment.
characters.background: Denis has been trying to keep his head down and serve his time peacefully. He believes in treating others with respect.

unlocks.50: Denis sneaks you extra food and supplies
unlocks.75: Denis reveals guard schedules and weak points
unlocks.95: Denis risks his safety to aid your escape

characters.name: Émile
characters.description: A dangerous inmate with a violent reputation. He's made it clear he doesn't like you and has threatened you multiple times.
characters.background: Émile is the muscle for the prison's most powerful gang. He's known for brutal attacks and has a personal grudge against you for reasons you don't fully understand.

characters.name: Dr. Moreau
characters.description: The prison doctor who runs the infirmary. Professional but distant, he treats inmates with clinical detachment.
characters.background: Dr. Moreau has worked at El Palo de Queso for over a decade. He's seen everything and maintains strict neutrality with inmates.

unlocks.30: Dr. Moreau provides medical supplies discreetly
unlocks.60: Dr. Moreau falsifies medical records for you
unlocks.85: Dr. Moreau actively assists in escape plans

characters.name: Lucía
characters.description: A sharp-minded inmate who works in the prison library. She's observant and well-informed about everything happening in the prison.
characters.background: Lucía was a journalist before being imprisoned for exposing government corruption. She maintains an information network within the prison.

unlocks.25: Lucía shares valuable intel about guards and inmates
unlocks.55: Lucía provides access to restricted documents
unlocks.80: Lucía coordinates the information network for your escape

characters.name: Warden Vásquez
characters.description: The warden of El Palo de Queso. Corrupt and ruthless, he runs the prison like a personal fiefdom.
characters.background: Warden Vásquez has been in charge for 15 years, amassing wealth through bribes and illegal dealings. He sees inmates as commodities.

unlocks.60: Warden might look the other way for the right price

characters.name: Padre Ramón
characters.description: The prison chaplain who offers spiritual guidance and counseling. He's one of the few genuinely good people in the prison.
characters.background: Padre Ramón has served at the prison for 8 years, trying to bring hope and redemption to the inmates. He opposes the warden's corruption.

unlocks.40: Padre Ramón provides sanctuary in the chapel
unlocks.65: Padre Ramón shares escape routes used by past inmates
unlocks.85: Padre Ramón actively works to expose prison corruption

characters.name: Carlos 'El Serpiente'
characters.description: The leader of the most powerful gang in El Palo de Queso. Cunning and dangerous, he controls much of the contraband trade.
characters.background: Carlos built his empire through manipulation and violence. He sees the prison as his kingdom and doesn't tolerate challenges to his authority.

unlocks.-10: Carlos orders his gang to leave you alone
unlocks.30: Carlos offers to work together on mutual goals
unlocks.70: Carlos provides resources and manpower for escape

characters.name: Officer Ramírez
characters.description: A prison guard who seems less corrupt than most. He's professional but shows occasional glimpses of humanity.
characters.background: Officer Ramírez is relatively new to El Palo de Queso and hasn't been fully corrupted yet. He struggles with the moral compromises required.

unlocks.25: Ramírez turns a blind eye to minor infractions
unlocks.50: Ramírez provides warnings about upcoming searches
unlocks.75: Ramírez actively assists your escape attempt

characters.name: María
characters.description: Your sister on the outside. Though you can't interact with her directly, her letters and visits remind you why you must survive and escape.
characters.background: María has been fighting to prove your innocence and working to get you out legally. She visits when she can and sends letters of encouragement.

unlocks.20: María sends care packages with hidden items
unlocks.60: María coordinates with outside contacts to help
unlocks.90: María arranges external support for your escape
